name: Rose Bouquet - Red
description: A beautiful arrangement of 12 red roses, perfect for expressing love and passion. Each rose is carefully selected and arranged by our expert florists.

name: Lily Bouquet - White
description: Elegant white lilies arranged in a stunning bouquet. Symbolizes purity and renewal, perfect for special occasions or as a gift.

name: Sunflower Bouquet
description: Bright and cheerful sunflowers that bring sunshine into any room. A perfect gift to brighten someone's day.

name: Mixed Spring Bouquet
description: A vibrant mix of seasonal spring flowers including tulips, daisies, and baby's breath. Fresh and colorful arrangement.

name: Orchid Plant - Purple
description: A stunning purple orchid plant that will last for weeks. Comes in an elegant ceramic pot. Perfect for home or office decor.

name: Tulip Bouquet - Pink
description: Beautiful pink tulips arranged in a classic bouquet. A symbol of perfect love and caring thoughts.

name: Carnation Bouquet - Mixed Colors
description: A colorful mix of carnations in various hues. Long-lasting and affordable, perfect for any occasion.

name: Lavender Bouquet
description: Fragrant lavender bouquet that brings a calming and soothing aroma. Perfect for relaxation and stress relief.

name: Peony Bouquet - Pink
description: Luxurious pink peonies in full bloom. These delicate flowers are known for their beauty and elegance.

name: Baby's Breath Bouquet
description: Delicate white baby's breath flowers perfect as a filler or standalone arrangement. Adds elegance to any setting.
